description:
An step by step brief overview of accounting processes in SAP. gives you an understanding of the various accounts, various functions in finance and controlling, also details the purpose of each of the granular elements in SAP FiCo / Accounting.

Instructions are in HD video. At the end of the lectures, you will receive the soft copy of the material discussed with more detailed notes and instructions.

The course begins with Accounting in general, takes you through various accounts in financial accounts. drills down to details on each account type. It covers in details all the important concepts and approaches used in SAP Fico.

The last section reviews controlling and associated cost concepts.
title: SAP Accounting
instructors: SAP Training Now & OJAYO SAP education university
